?,Yes. Ulcerative colitis is a condition in which there is a chronic break in the lining of the colon. It has been associated with an increased risk of colon cancer.,NIHSeniorHealth,Colorectal Cancer
What is (are) Colorectal Cancer ?,"Parents, siblings, or children of a person who has had colorectal cancer are somewhat more likely to develop this type of cancer themselves.
